name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, open Haiku Reader”
”Alexa, launch Haiku Reader”
”Alexa, begin Haiku Reader”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des: Experience daily inspiration and enjoyment with the Haiku Reader skill on Alexa. This skill provides you with a curated collection of haikus, perfect for moments of reflection and relaxation. Effortlessly navigate and access these beautiful and fun poems using simple voice commands. Just say the wake word, prompt Alexa to share a haiku poem, and then sit back to enjoy and relax as she recites the daily selection. With Haiku Reader, every day brings a new opportunity to immerse yourself in the world of poetry on any Alexa device.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
